overview_of_class: The focus of this course is an overview of research and theory related to children's cognitive development from infancy through adolescence, with a primary focus on early childhood. Among the topics we will cover are theories of cognitive development, conceptual development, problem solving, language, comparative cognition, memory, reasoning, and theory of mind. We will consider classic theories and studies as well as more recent research that addresses these topics.
name: Cognitive Development
subject: PSYCH
